title: So im doing an experiment.
body:
As some of you are aware, i am very Anti Automatic banning. 

My most common topic is about how retarded riot is for not reinstating the tribunal system, regardless of weather it is finished or not.

I have seen quite a few nay sayers who honestly do not believe that the report system is fucked, and they honestly believe toxic players get punished.

To this end i have create a few accounts, that i will not disclose the names of here for a little experiment.

One of the accounts will have nothing but troll games on it, it will feed, it will be toxic, it will afk, the works.

Another is a control account where i just play it like i would my main.

And another is an account where i will try to be as enthusiastic as possible.

Ill report back in a months time, as considering i can easily play up to 20 games of league a day the troll account should have well over 10'000 reports by that time.

If i am not banned by then riot, well thats when discussions will be had.

replies.body:
> Ill report back in a months time, as considering i can easily play up to 20 games of league a day the troll account should have well over 10'000 reports by that time.

Considering the average days in a month is 30, and you can play 20 games a day and somehow get 9 reports per game it would reach 5400 reports. I think you need to redo your maths dude.

Considering those 20 games per day will also be spread out across 3 different accounts, the "troll" account would reach about 1800 reports (maximum) in one months worth of play, quite far from the "estimated" 10k+.
Didnt do math just estimated, apparently i was way the fuck off with it haha.

Drop in the water buddo.

If the report systems work i should get banned in the first few days of doing this.

If they dont fucking work, and the account is still standing after the 30 days, then the issue stops becoming me.

And its riots inability to create an accurate automatic system, hence why we should bring back the tribunal.

Now personally i know for a fact if i wanted to i could make this experiment last for an entire year and still not get banned, but i personally cant act like a dick for that long.

But at the end of the day, what i am trying to show here, is that if i can make the most toxic account in existence, and play for a month straight without getting banned.

Then imagine how many other toxic people are flying under the radar.

No im trying to force their hands.

Ive been playing league since 2009.

I actually physically remember when we had a tribunal. I also remember the time before we had a tribunal, and riot had to do reports manually.

Let me tell you right now, you want a tribunal, and you want it now not 3 more years from now.

Because trust me riot isnt fucking working on it, they may say they are, but they also said they were taking the tribunal off for a short "maintenance" back in 2014.

Tell me, does maintenance take 2 years for literally a system that just presented report cases to a stand of players and asked them if the offendee is guilty? (you know like how a real unbiased tribunal works)

Like who the fuck is riot fooling, they didnt take 2 years to fucking code a backend for that, they took 2 years to make the automatic systems that are failing so fucking hard and used the whole "tribunal is coming" shit to deflect any argumentative backlash about said systems and are waiting for us to all forget about the tribunal existing.

And why? Because one of the things that they think made the tribunal work was it rewarded players for cases, and riot hates free shit.

Realllllly good fucking reason for scrapping your most successful system that cleaned up the game and actually made it fucking fun riot.


As for the 20 games a day, i have insomnia, no job (and can multitask so i tend to apply for jobs while i play) and frankly never really got into sports or excercise in general, so how else am i going to spend my 15-18 hours a day that im awake.

Theres only so many things i could do.

But its also why im dead convinced that the report systems dont work and the toxicity in the community is super downplayed, because never in my history of playing league have i seen it get this bad before, and im not playing one or two games and getting a bad one and saying "half my games are bad" im playing like twenty games, and getting two or three games with good players that dont rage.

I'm not saying we dont need a tribunal, am I? :)

I'm saying the way you're goin for it is quite immature and very very useless. I'm all for creative ideas, but they have to be reasoned.
I'll tell you what you will achieve by doing what you want:
* create a lot of tension in the community
* wasting even more time of what you have
* get banned on your toxic account (because yes, believe it or not, a behavioural system is in place).

What you most likely won't get is:
* a tribunal

'Cause I don't think Riot will think "Oh look at that guy being angry and stomping feet! He must be whining for something good and mature, let's give him what he wants!". In other words: we don't negotiate with terrorists :)

Now, honey, I understand you're salty (and meat is better salty anyway), but in a society and civilized country, we ask things nicely, possibly by offering our hand and solutions, instead of raising our voice and being nasty to the same people we are trying to help. 
I can see that you think: "If i become the bad guy, more people will realize we need a tribunal", but it is not how it will end up and, once again, feel free to test it out by yourself.

On the other hand, here's 20 things you can do with your spare time, instead of multitasking in front of a screen:
1) get a shower
2) go out to the museum (free exhibits are free)
3) catch up with friends, outside
4) throw a party
5) go to a party
6) practice painting
7) practice playing guitar
8) go to the beach (or the park, if that's far)
9) call your parents (or talk to them and about their day)
10) show up to give resume (ppl like it better) - many places will accept you as a waiter, while you look for better jobs.
11) bake a cake
12) clean the house
13) clean the garden (if you've got one)
14) contact Riot about the tribunal system, being nice about it
15) read a book (I suggest the Discworld series, it's hilarious and easy to read)
16) learn a new language
17) make new friends
18) go see your grandparents (even the dead ones are a good trip, trust me)
19) learn how to saw/knit/cook
20) try and be less anxious about stuff by meditating or doing yoga

You'll realize most of these things cost you 0$, are often available at night and will make you a bit less dependent of league :)

xoxo
